modName: Gli Beindae  -Wood-Elf Companion- Ranger Hunter Scout
summary: Gli Beindae (pronounced glee bain-die in LOTR Elvish for Honey Beautiful Shadow) is another one of my humanized Wood Elves for those that dislike the Roswell look Vanilla bestowed upon the mer races in the game.  This character is a scout, ranger and hunter style character that is a little more natural looking than my Braithwen Wood-Elf companion.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1341529274.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][size= 3]Gli Beindae (pronounced glee bain-die in LOTR Elvish, means Honey Beautiful Shadow) is another one of my humanized Wood Elves for those that dislike the Roswell look Vanilla bestowed upon the mer races in the game.  Gli is quite a bit more natural looking than my Braithwen mod (Braithwen reminds me of an Elven princess) and would probably work best with a Ranger, Scout or Hunter type character. Her Elvish ears poke out of her hair just slightly or you would never suspect she is a Wood Elf. Gli is located at the Old Hroldan Inn south of Markarth and west of Rorikstead.[/size][/b] 

[b]Files needed:
***Required***Human eyes for Elves by Porcelyn: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=195
***Required***ApachiiSkyHair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
Not required but highly recommended! Install after Bella\'s face mod and overwrite Bella\'s eyebrows.
CBBE- by Caliente Darker Neater Eyebrows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

Stats:
Game Race: Wood Elf
Hair: Light Red (Almost a Honey/Amber color)
Eyes: Dark Brown or Green
Skin Tone: Human White 
Scaled Weight: 45% weight on the scale, should be fine for ADEC, CBBE and UNPB BBP users. 
Height: 5\'6\" to 5\"7\"
Location: Old Hroldan Inn
Inventory: Imperial Bow and 50 Steel Arrows
Voice: Female Young Eager
[/b]

[b]I used Bella\'s Better Females, Makeup variant 1 and (No Shine some pics) on her.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Pretty Lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 with Navetseas body \"Muscle Patch v2\" textures. (She can be used with whatever body you prefer)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666[/b]

[b][size=2]Thanks as always for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/size][/b]
author: FalmerBane
